Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "[release/3.1] Update dependencies from dotnet/core-setup" (#1762)

Issues.Title: Move NativeWindow imports to interop
Issues.Body:
Move a number of the imports used in NativeWindow to the new interop pattern. Also introduce WindowMessage to match the approach in the designer.

The idea with WindowMessage is to make it signficantly easier to debug.  It is extremely mentally taxing to follow message pumping with `int`.  Converting over WindowMessages is a huge change, so doing it in phases.

###### Microsoft Reviewers: [Open in CodeFlow](http://wpcp.azurewebsites.net/CodeFlowProtocolProxy2.php?pullrequest=https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/1764)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Move NativeWindow imports to interop" (#1764)

Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "[master] Update dependencies from dotnet/core-setup" (#1765)

Issues.Title: Need to flesh out Office/VS integration scenarios
Issues.Body:
#1565 cleans up the `IMsoComponent` OLE related code, but we don't have a clear understanding of the expected interop scenarios with Office and VS with WinForms on .NET Core.

We need to clearly answer:

1. How hosting is expected (or not expected) to work
2. What basic scenarios we want to validate/enable, if any
3. Level of Office support for OLE plugins (understood to be depreciated?)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Need to flesh out Office/VS integration scenarios" (#1763)

Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "[master] Update dependencies from dotnet/core-setup" (#1757)

Issues.Title: `PictureBox` to use `HttpClient` instead of using `WebRequest`
Issues.Body:
* .NET Core Version: 3.0 

<!-- Read https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/master/Documentation/issue-guide.md -->

**Problem description:**

`PictureBox` uses an instance of `WebRequest` to load images. 
It needs to be replaces with a cached instance of `HttpClient` as suggest in https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/1696#discussion_r320565246

**Expected behavior:**

**Minimal repro:**

https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/release/3.0/src/System.Windows.Forms/src/System/Windows/Forms/PictureBox.cs#L558-L564
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "`PictureBox` to use `HttpClient` instead of using `WebRequest`" (#1756)
